comment: He is a good and knowledgeable professor. Don't spend your time complaining about his rules and just sit back and listen, I promise what you learn from him will make it worth it. There are two tests and two papers. Just stick the class out and he will make it worth it for you.

He does not listen to what other students have to say, if he disagrees with you, he will just cut you off and continue with lecture. Attendance is mandatory, in his syllabus it says if you miss more than 10 days, you will receive an F in the Couse.

This class is a NIGHTMARE!!!!! Do not take this class if you're looking for an easy semester, he does not allow us to use our phones, laptops, or ipads during class. Even before the start of class if he sees you with your phone, he will not hesitate to call you out.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: class was very discussion based,no powerpoints only him talking and you having to take notes, we were given 2 papers and 2 tests, no technology allowed at all (phones,laptops,ipads etc) all tests were in person and papers also had to be given in person printed out. We were given many articles to read, but overall a very interesting and funny class!

comment: You will not pass if you don't go to class. Attendance is graded. 2 papers, 2 exams, one final(iykyk), gives extra credit in class.
